feed.title: Voltaserve Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v2.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(ui): show circle around active profile image when active by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/160
  • fix: 3D thumbnail generation by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/164
  • feat(conversion): lazy download for dependencies by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/165
  • chore: issue templates by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/161
  • ci(language): integrate Python linters by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/178
  • feat: lazy download for languages, and support more by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/169
  • fix: don't error on unknown files by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/180
  • fix(api): search pagination, format SQL queries by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/185
  • perf: improve performance of IsGrandChildOf by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/188
  • feat(migration): create user table by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/191
  • feat(migration): create organization table and join table for membership by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/194
  • feat(migration): create workspace table by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/195
  • ci: fix migration dockerfile path by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/201
  • chore: make migrations dockerfile multi-arch aware by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/202
  • fix(migrations): CockroachDB compatibility & separate permission tables by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/204
  • chore: switch back to Node.js because Bun is unstable by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/206
  • fix(ui): account notification glitch by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/208
  • fix: permission system blockers by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/207
  • docs: add linter instructions to README.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/213
  • perf: fast copy by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/209
  • perf: fast move by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/210
  • perf: fast delete by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/211
  • refactor: clients, preparing the ground for deduplication by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/212
  • fix: mitigate issues after merging PRs by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/214
  • refactor(api): use std's slices.Include() by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/215
  • ci: add TypeScript compiler step to UI and IdP by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/218
  • fix: when deleting a workspace, the associated S3 bucket is not deleted by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/219
  • feat(conversion): support Apple documents by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/221
  • chore: add migrations to Docker Compose file by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/222
  • fix(webdav): compatibiilty with Joplin by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/223
  • docs: add Rust to DEVELOPMENT.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/224
  • feat: password hint by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/225
  • feat: less docker layers by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/205
  • chore: changed date in placeholder by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/232
  • feat: build check by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/233
  • docs: update DEVELOPMENT.md by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/234
  • fix(ci): migrations path by @loboda4450 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/236
  • feat(ui): support keyboard shortcuts by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/230
  • chore: run go mod tidy by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/231
  • fix(ui): rename single item when using keyboard shortcut by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/237
  • fix(migration): make compatible with initial sql file by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/228
  • fix(ui): change rename key on macOS not to interfere by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/238
  • reafactor: Combine most of duplicated code and unify conditional rendering by @Mrkazik99 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/235
  • chore(ui): integrate Prettier with ESLint, to get formatting errors in the CI by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/239
  • ci(migrations): use migrations with an s as image name by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/240
  • fix(api): make workspace root id nullable by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/241
  • fix(migration): make compatible with initial sql file by ignoring duplicate tables by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/242
  • fix(migration): ignore duplicate indices by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/243
  • fix(migrations): add proper on delete actions by @dsonck92 in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/244
  • fix(ui): revert changes by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/245

New Contributors

  • @Mrkazik99 made their first contribution in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v2.0.2...v2.1.0
